#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int Is_That_Num_encore(int n,int num)
{
    int i,temp=n,digit_sum=0,temp_sum=0;
   while(1)
    {
      temp=n;
      while(temp)
      {
         digit_sum+=temp%10;
         temp/=10;
      }
       temp_sum=digit_sum+n;
       digit_sum=0;
       if(temp_sum==num)
         return n;
       else if(temp_sum<num)
          n++;
       if(temp_sum>num)
          return 0;
   }

}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int num,n,temp;
        scanf("%d",&num);
        n=num;
        int count =0;
        while(n)
        {
            count++;
            n=n/10;
        }
        n=num-count*9-1;
        if(Is_That_Num_encore(n,num))
            cout << Is_That_Num_encore(n,num) <<"\n";
        else
            cout <<"NONE\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
